name: Until We Die
description:
Become a leader
In Until We Die, you directly control your wards. Decide what's important for surviving in an extreme environment of the post-apocalyptic world.
As your community expands, lead people through the abandoned tunnels of the underground to find new space for your colony.
Order to build defenses and gather supplies while you and your stalkers defend the settlement from the mutants lurking in the dark.Come together
The safety is in numbers. Join your friend in a local co-op mode. Explore the world and crush mutants dens together...until you die!
